original_text: an oath by the Lord shall be between them both to see whether or not he has put his hand to his neighbor's property. The owner shall accept the oath, and he shall not make restitution.
korean_text: 두 사람 사이에 맡은 자가 이웃의 것에 손을 대지 아니하였다고 여호와께 맹세할 것이요 그 임자는 그대로 믿을 것이며 그 사람은 배상하지 아니하려니와

sentences.original_text: an oath by the Lord shall be between them both
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 맹세가 그들 둘 사이에 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to see whether or not he has put his hand to his neighbor's property
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이웃의 재산에 손을 대었는지 여부를 알아보기 위해

sentences.original_text: The owner shall accept the oath
and he shall not make restitution
